name: Chilled Rock
text: You can transfer the cold of your body to the rocks you throw.
benefit: Any items you throw with your rock throwing ability are chilled by your touch, dealing an additional 1d6 points of cold damage.
text_zh: 你可以将自己天生的低温传递给你投掷的岩石。
benefit_zh: 你通过投石能力投掷的物体将在命中目标时造成1d6点额外的寒冷伤害。
